info.title: Smart Booking Scheduler API - V1
info.description: Complete API documentation for Smart Booking Scheduler. Comprehensive system for managing services, bookings, and scheduling.

post.description: Public endpoint for clients to book an appointment. No authentication required.

Returns available appointment slots for a given date based on service duration.

post.description: Create a new service with name, description, duration, and price.

put.description: Update an existing service. All fields are optional - send only what you want to update.
